sentences.en: Can I enlist your help in collecting money for the orphans?
sentences.cn: 我们为那些孤儿募集钱,你能出一点 吗 ?

sentences.en: Enlist people's participation to elicit information relevant to your project.
sentences.cn: 发动人们的参与,来引出于与你的项目相关的信息.

sentences.en: Enlist the help of friends, family, and coworkers and know they're watching.
sentences.cn: 借助朋友, 家人和同事,并知道他们在观察你.

sentences.en: Enlist the help of RI committee and task force members where appropriate.
sentences.cn: 争取国际扶轮委员会及行动小组委员们适当的协助.

sentences.en: I had to cut down a tree and enlist the help of seven neighbours to get it out of the garden!
sentences.cn: 我不得不砍掉一棵树，并叫来7位邻居帮忙把树抬出花园！

sentences.en: I had to enlist Rou Shi's help again.
If the bailiff thinks that things could turn nasty he will enlist the help of the police.
sentences.cn: 如果法警认为事情变得不可收拾，他就会寻求警方的帮助。

sentences.en: If your marriage or relationship is in disrepair, enlist the help of a marriage guidance counsellor.
sentences.cn: 如果你们的婚姻或关系出现裂痕，就向婚姻指导顾问求助。

sentences.en: Many people enlist in the Red Cross drive each year.
sentences.cn: 许多人每年参加红十字会运动.

sentences.en: More than 100 famous media enlist whole journey report.
sentences.cn: 百余家知名媒体参与全程报道.

sentences.en: The mayor tried to enlist every citizen in the clean - up campaign.
sentences.cn: 市长努力使每个市民参加这场清洁运动.

sentences.en: They come here to enlist men for the army.
sentences.cn: 他们来这儿是为了召兵.

sentences.en: We'll enlist him in our movement.
sentences.cn: 我们要他参加我们的运动.

sentences.en: When she contacted me at the beginning of August to enlist support, Sharon and I sprang into action.
sentences.cn: 她8月初和我联系请求帮助时，我和沙伦便立即行动起来了。

words.tran_cn: 征募，应征入伍；服兵役期限

trans.tran_en: to persuade someone to help you to do something
